revision.comment: Notification of altered sources needing review #IABot (v1.2.7)
revision.text: {{WPBiography |living=yes |class=start |musician-work-group=yes |listas=A }} {{Wikiproject Alternative music|class=Start|importance=Low}} ==Fair use rationale for Image:Howacearebuildings.jpg== [[Image:Nuvola apps important.svg|70px|left]] '''[[:Image:Howacearebuildings.jpg]]''' is being used on this article. I notice the image page specifies that the image is being used under [[Wikipedia:Fair use|fair use]] but there is no [[Wikipedia:Fair use rationale guideline|explanation or rationale]] as to why its use in '''this''' Wikipedia article constitutes fair use. In addition to the [[Wikipedia:Image copyright tags/Fair use|boilerplate fair use template]], you must also write out on the image description page a specific explanation or rationale for why using this image in each article is consistent with [[WP:FU|fair use]]. Please go to [[:Image:Howacearebuildings.jpg|the image description page]] and edit it to include a [[Wikipedia:Fair use rationale guideline |fair use rationale]]. Using one of the templates at [[Wikipedia:Fair use rationale guideline]] is an easy way to insure that your image is in compliance with Wikipedia policy, but remember that you must complete the template. Do not simply insert a blank template on an image page. If there is other other fair use media, consider checking that you have specified the fair use rationale on the other images used on this page. Note that any fair use images uploaded after 4 May, 2006, and lacking such an explanation will be deleted one week after they have been uploaded, as described on [[Wikipedia:Criteria for speedy deletion#Images.2FMedia|criteria for speedy deletion]]. If you have any questions please ask them at the [[Wikipedia:Media copyright questions|Media copyright questions page]]. Thank you.[[User:BetacommandBot|BetacommandBot]] 03:51, 6 June 2007 (UTC) Band formation: Suffolk or Leeds- please explain and clear up the article. I _THINK_ they're from Suffolk, but don't know where. —Preceding [[Wikipedia:Signatures|unsigned]] comment added by [[User:Darren Rowe|Darren Rowe]] ([[User talk:Darren Rowe|talk]] • [[Special:Contributions/Darren Rowe|contribs]]) 23:10, 23 September 2007 (UTC) == Merge info from [[Adam Perry (drummer)]] == There's a lot of repeated (and unsourced) info on [[Adam Perry (drummer)]], that should really be here, otherwise it could constitute a [[POV fork]]. I suggest Adam's page just states that he played in ''A'' and links here. [[User:Famousdog|Famousdog]] ([[User talk:Famousdog|talk]]) 13:02, 4 April 2008 (UTC) ==Update please== From the lead: "However, as of 2008, the band have announced they are back in the studio to start work on a new album, set to be released next year." - Next year being 2011... I know nothing about this band and only ended up here at random. Anyone know whether they did release that album? The rest of the article pretty much stops in 2008, also. Cheers --[[User:Jubileeclipman|Jubilee]][[WP:CTM|♫]][[User talk:Jubileeclipman|clipman]] 22:19, 9 April 2010 (UTC) No, no album was released in 2011. however they have just stated on their twitter feed that they will be in the studio this week. I have mentioned it and linked the post in the article as a reference. — Preceding [[Wikipedia:Signatures|unsigned]] comment added by [[Special:Contributions/217.28.10.67|217.28.10.67]] ([[User talk:217.28.10.67|talk]]) 19:31, 20 June 2011 (UTC) == External links modified == Hello fellow Wikipedians, I have just modified {{plural:1|one external link|1 external links}} on [[A (band)]]. Please take a moment to review [https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?diff=prev&oldid=742059242 my edit]. If you have any questions, or need the bot to ignore the links, or the page altogether, please visit [[User:Cyberpower678/FaQs#InternetArchiveBot|this simple FaQ]] for additional information. I made the following changes: *Added archive https://web.archive.org/web/20150226152626/http://forums.downloadfestival.co.uk/m6124595.aspx to http://forums.downloadfestival.co.uk/m6124595.aspx *Added {{tlx|dead link}} tag to http://www.jasonperryrock.com/ When you have finished reviewing my changes, please set the ''checked'' parameter below to '''true''' or '''failed''' to let others know (documentation at {{tlx|Sourcecheck}}). {{sourcecheck|checked=false}} Cheers.—[[User:InternetArchiveBot|'''InternetArchiveBot''']] ([[User talk:InternetArchiveBot|Report bug]]) 12:40, 1 October 2016 (UTC) == External links modified == Hello fellow Wikipedians, I have just modified {{plural:4|one external link|4 external links}} on [[A (band)]]. Please take a moment to review [https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?diff=prev&oldid=748777003 my edit]. If you have any questions, or need the bot to ignore the links, or the page altogether, please visit [[User:Cyberpower678/FaQs#InternetArchiveBot|this simple FaQ]] for additional information. I made the following changes: *Added archive https://web.archive.org/web/20100326191210/http://www.verseonemagazine.com:80/May/BeyondJasonPerry.htm to http://www.verseonemagazine.com/May/BeyondJasonPerry.htm *Added archive https://web.archive.org/web/20090106234051/http://www.a-communication.co.uk:80/viewtopic.php?t=437 to http://www.a-communication.co.uk/viewtopic.php?t=437 *Added archive https://web.archive.org/web/20090106083257/http://www.a-communication.co.uk:80/viewtopic.php?t=437&postdays=0&postorder=asc&start=30 to http://www.a-communication.co.uk/viewtopic.php?t=437&postdays=0&postorder=asc&start=30 *Added archive https://web.archive.org/web/20090106144828/http://www.a-communication.co.uk:80/viewtopic.php?t=437&postdays=0&postorder=asc&start=60 to http://www.a-communication.co.uk/viewtopic.php?t=437&postdays=0&postorder=asc&start=60 When you have finished reviewing my changes, please set the ''checked'' parameter below to '''true''' or '''failed''' to let others know (documentation at {{tlx|Sourcecheck}}). {{sourcecheck|checked=false}} Cheers.—[[User:InternetArchiveBot|'''InternetArchiveBot''']] ([[User talk:InternetArchiveBot|Report bug]]) 09:11, 10 November 2016 (UTC)
